title: Town Hall Announcement
description: We invite you to voice your concerns and have your questions answered regarding community and environmental issues by Commissioner Kowal and Rep. Benaroch.
raw_text:
ARE YOU CONCERNED ABOUT THE HAPPENINGS IN YOUR COMMUNITY
DO YOU HAVE ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS
WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE POLICY CHANGES
VOICE YOUR CONCERNS & HAVE YOUR QUESTIONS ANSWERED.

TOWN HALL ANNOUNCEMENT:

WHO: COMMISSIONER KOWAL (R-DIST. 4) AND REP. BENARROCH (R-DIST. 81)
WHEN: WEDNESDAY AUGUST 13, 2025 5:30PM–6:30PM
WHERE: NAPLES REGIONAL LIBRARY
650 CENTRAL AVE. NAPLES, FL 34102
HOW: RSVP JAMIE.MERCHANT@FLHOUSE.GOV

BRING YOUR VOICE, BRING YOUR PROTEST SIGN, BRING NOISE MAKERS FUN OUTFITS IN CASE WE CAN'T GET IN
raw_summary: The flyer advertises a town hall meeting focused on community and environmental issues, offering attendees the chance to voice concerns and seek answers from Commissioner Kowal and Rep. Benaroch. The event is scheduled for August 13, 2025, at the Naples Regional Library in Florida.

title: Pataskala Street Fair

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering
description: Join us on the pedestrian bridge over the I-5, Lacey, on August 16, 2025, from 12 to 2 at the Chehalis Western Trail. Bring high-visibility protest signs, flags, and a good mood to make good trouble!
address: Chehalis Western Trail, Pedestrian Bridge over I-5
meeting_location: Chehalis Western Trail, Pedestrian Bridge over I-5, Lacey
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING
16 AUGUST 2025
FROM 12 TO 2
CHEHALIS WESTERN TRAIL
PEDESTRIAN BRIDGE OVER I-5, LACEY
BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, & A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!
MORE INFORMATION: BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG AND THEBLOP.ORG
DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK
STAND UP FIGHT BACK!
raw_summary: The image announces an event by the Olympia Visibility Brigade for an "Overpass Bannering" event on August 16, 2025. The event invites participants to bring protest signs and join on the pedestrian bridge over the I-5, Lacey, at the Chehalis Western Trail from 12 to 2. The purpose is to make a visible protest. More information is available through the mentioned websites.

title: Indivisible ‘Big, Beautiful Bill’ Townhall

2925 Old Missouri Rd. Fayetteville
MISSING PERSONS

title: Workers Over Billionaires
description: We are organizing an event on Labor Day to emphasize the importance of workers over billionaires. Our aim is to foster nonviolent action and reduce potential confrontations with those with differing values.
raw_text:
LABOR DAY, MONDAY, SEPT. 1, 2025
2PM
1N. MAIN STREET, BRIGHAM CITY
WORKERS OVER BILLIONAIRES
Indivisible Box Elder
A CORE PRINCIPLE BEHIND ALL INDIVISIBLE EVENTS IS A COMMITMENT TO NONVIOLENT ACTION. WE EXPECT ALL PARTICIPANTS TO SEEK TO DE-ESCALATE ANY POTENTIAL CONFRONTATION WITH THOSE WHO DISAGREE WITH OUR VALUES.
